title: New Level Icon Wasn't Added to Icon Inventory
body:
I just completed the "Villains Rule!" mission and was rewarded with the New Level icon in the post-game lobby, however, it's not showing up in my icon inventory list. I already tried restarting my client to see if that would resolve the issue, but it didn't work.

Edit: A fix I found to this issue is using the old "Arcade Star" icon that I believe you were able to buy for IP one or two seasons ago. I used that icon and played a game and earned progress towards the new missions. I hope that helps. It looks like this one:

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/skins-arcade-2016/en_US/f4c1e232ac42e2be734952e1a577f096f02b955b/assets/images/icon-power-up.jpg

Edit #2: I believe Riot is manually distributing the icons now because I just got mine. They are aware of the problem and I hope it's resolved soon. Good luck guys.

replies.body:
Please let me know in a reply to this comment if you still do not have the New Level Icon at this point after completing the required mission.

https://i.gyazo.com/a99d7fb1729e3698ecb8fffb929119f5.png

> Please let me know in a reply to this comment if you still do not have the New Level Icon at this point after completing the required mission.
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/a99d7fb1729e3698ecb8fffb929119f5.png

Haha I hope you got my reply I just sent you. I have the icon now. Thanks again for you hard work in helping everyone out.

http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif


....should have led off with this gif xD! All in a good days work bro ^_^
I don't have mine.
I went ahead and double checked your account, and the New Level Icon is already safely tucked away in your list of icons. Make sure to double check for the one I posted above.
I dont have mine still..
I've checked your account and the New Level Icon is already sitting in your available icons. Make sure to check your list by clicking on your current icon, and you should see it there.
I do not have mine :(

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YFYJG23v,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2017-08-11T03:16:00.877+0000)
>

I still didn't get anything after completing the quests... Sad face. Not even NEW LEVEL. I was rewarded with tickets but they also say "zero" in my loot{{champion:37}}
I double checked your icons as most players have gotten theirs by now. It looks like you do have the New level icon sitting in your Summoner Icons, so be sure to check for it again!

Ayyyyy Ninjaguy! Hope you're enjoying the Arcade event so far!

It looks like the system was having a bit of trouble getting those icons added at first. As it turns out, you're able to use any of those arcade icons AFAIK, so thank poro for that. Let me know if you still haven't gotten that icon, and I should be able to get those delivery poros in shape!

I completed the mission nearly when the event first started (11:10 am) I still haven't received the new level icon yet D:
Please help  >.> I don't have any arcade icons   {{item:3070}}
I've double checked for you, and it looks like your icon did finally get delivered. Make sure to check again for it!

Hi there Broporo,

nothing changed on my account either until now (just checked it once again). Would be great if you could fix it. Don't have any old arcade Icons, so I need to depend on your help. Thanks for the good work ^_^
Looks like your's finally showed up! Had to nudge those poros along a bit with some snax, but thankfully they made the trek unscathed ^_^!

Good afternoon, Broporo-senpai. I just restarted my client and I still haven't received the New Level icon yet. But please forget about me and help the poor souls in this thread. I have the Arcade Star icon already but some of these good people aren't as fortunate. 

https://media.giphy.com/media/oBPOP48aQpIxq/giphy.gif

Straaaaaange. I did just as you said, manually added the icon and I do see it sitting there now. Should look like this....

https://i.gyazo.com/a99d7fb1729e3698ecb8fffb929119f5.png

If you don't see it, make sure to scroll down a bit. Hit me up with some screenshots if it's truly not there so we can investigate!!

I got the icon a few hours ago. I'm not sure if I was unclear in my Edit #2 with my wording but I definitely have it now. Thanks for your efforts in getting this resolved. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Sorry if you can't personally do anything about this, but I am a newer player and I don't have any other arcade icons so I was wondering if you could somehow give me the new level icon that I didn't get from the mission?
I have the same problem, and it seems many others also have it, lets cross our fingers that riot hotfixes this :(
